title: Get Permalink for a Post
description: Use the Jekyll post_url tag to insert the permalink URL of a post. For example: {% post_url /subdir/2010-07-21-name-of-post %}

fields.name: subdir
fields.title: subdirectory path to the post (Optional). Example: /subdir/

fields.name: title
fields.title: title in single or double quotes (Optional)
